K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:413b-25: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:413b-31: dngos po med par chos rnams ston pa dag la khyod kyis bsnyen par bya /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414a-3: khyod kyis de ltar bsgrubs na /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414a-4: ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du chud pa'am /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414a-5: dge slong chos smra ba'i lus la yod pa thos par 'gyur te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414a-7: gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa de la khyod kyis ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414a-8: khyod kyis byas pa gzo ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414a-9: byas pa tshor bar bya ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414a-10: gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa 'di ni /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414a-11: bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414a-12: 'di bdag gis thos pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par 'gyur zhing /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414a-14: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dang ma bral pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414a-15: mi khom pa rnams spong bar 'gyur ro //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414a-16: dal ba phun sum tshogs pa spyod pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414a-18: phan yon 'di rnams khyod kyis yongs su rtogs la dge slong chos smra ba la ston pa yin par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414a-20: khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar mi bya'i /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414a-21: khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba la chos don du gnyer ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414b-0: chos la gus par bya bas phyi @414b bzhin 'brang bar bya'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414b-1: khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams kyang rtogs par bya ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzugs dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414b-8: reg pa dag bsnyen pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414b-10: spyad par bya ba'i phyir nye bar sgrub ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414b-11: de dag chos smra ba des zil gyis mnan nas thabs mkhas pas 'grogs shing bsten par byed pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414b-12: bsnyen par byed pa'ang yod de /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414b-14: khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba de la ma dad pa bskyed par mi bya'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414b-15: gzhan du na sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414b-17: thabs mkhas pa de mi shes kyi /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414b-19: thabs mkhas pa rab tu shes so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414b-21: sems can gdul ba'i tshul gyis sems can rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chos 'di dag la brten cing 'grogs te bsnyen par byed kyi /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414b-22: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414b-25: skad cig de nyid la rigs kyi bu /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414b-26: khyod nyid kyis chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul so sor brtag par bya'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414b-28: chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul gang zhe na /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414b-30: chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414b-31: rnam par byang ba ma yin no //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:414b-34: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415a-8: khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i tshul de ltar rtog cing chos smra ba'i rjes su 'brang na /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415a-9: ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415a-11: gzhan yang khyod kyis bdud kyi las la som shig /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415a-13: gal te chos smra ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu la brnyas par byed cing mi sems na /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415a-14: de la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyir bsngo bar mi bya ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415a-15: gzhan du na chos don du gnyer ba nyid dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415a-16: chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415a-17: yid mi skyo bas dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415a-18: zhes de skad kyang thos so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415a-19: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de las rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs nas shar phyogs ga la ba der song ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415a-20: ring por ma phyin par de 'di snyam du sems te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415a-21: bdag gis sgra de la ji srid du 'gro bar bya ba ma dris so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415a-22: snyam du bsams nas de sa phyogs de nyid du ngu zhing cho nges 'debs te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415a-23: mya ngan byed la smre zhing 'dug ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415a-25: sa phyogs 'di nyid du nyin zhag gcig gi bar du nyin mtshan 'da' bar bya'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415b-0: nyin mtshan gnyis @415b sam; gsum mam /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415b-4: nyin mtshan bdun yang 'da' bar bya ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par ma gyur gyi bar du lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi skyed; rmugs pa dang gnyid yid la byed pa mi skyed /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415b-6: bza' ba yid la byed pa mi skyed /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415b-7: btung ba yid la byed pa mi skyed /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415b-8: mtshan me [*mo?] yid la byed pa mi skyed /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415b-9: nyin mo yid la byed pa mi skyed /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415b-10: grang ba yid la byed pa mi skyed /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415b-11: tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skyed do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415b-16: skyes bu la la zhig bu gcig pa 'chi ba'i dus byas na sdug bsngal ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415b-17: yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415b-18: de mya ngan gyis bu gcig pu yid la byed pa nyid ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang mi 'byung ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415b-20: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus yang de'i tshe bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur snyam pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang ma byung ngo //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415b-22: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar gdung zhing 'dug pa'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shig bzhugs nas legs so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415b-23: zhes bya ba byin te 'di skad du /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415b-25: khyod kyis tshig de skad smra ba legs so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:415b-27: ji ltar khyed kyis da ltar yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416a-0: @416a *// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal to //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416a-2: de'i phyir khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'di nyid dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416a-4: don du gnyer ba 'di nyid dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416a-5: 'dod pa 'di lta bu nyid kyis rjes su 'brang zhing shar /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416a-6: phyogs nyid du song zhig dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416a-8: 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya na spos dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416a-10: shing ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416a-12: zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416a-15: skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416a-16: bar gyi tshong khang gi phreng ba ri mo sna tshogs su bris pa lta bur blta na sdug pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416a-19: skye bo dang khyogs kyi bzhon pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416a-20: rkang gis 'gro ba'i gnas 'dzer dog med par gnas pa lnga brgya dag gis legs par bsgrubs pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416a-21: grong khyer gyi de'i khor yug tu zhol gyi phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyis bskor la /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416a-22: rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi ra ba de dag gi mda' yab rnams ni /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416a-23: dzambu chu bo'i gser las byas pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416a-24: mtho zhing tshad dang ldan pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416b-0: @416b mda' yab thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi shing skyes te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416b-1: rin po che sna tshogs bkra ba'i shing thog gi 'bras bu chags pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416b-2: mda' yab las shing skyes pa thams cad las kyang rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi thag gu byung bas mda' yab gnyis pa'i shing gzhan dang 'brel ba /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416b-3: thams cad dang ldan pa'i grong khyer de gser gyi dril bu g-yer ka'i dra bas khebs te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416b-4: gser gyi dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba de dag la rlung gis btab na /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416b-5: sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416b-7: yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo sna tshogs pa rol mo mkhan mkhas pas brdungs shing blangs na /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416b-8: sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba de bzhin du /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416b-9: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba de dag la rlung gis btab na /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416b-10: sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416b-11: sgra des sems can de dag rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416b-12: grong khyer de khor yug tu 'obs chu rjes su mthun par 'bab pa'i chus yongs su gang zhing /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416b-13: chu ha cang yang mi grang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416b-14: ba ha cang yang mi dro bas gang ba dag yod do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416b-15: chu de dag nyid la sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416b-16: rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa'i gru dag yod de /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416b-17: der sems can dag zhugs nas rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:416b-18: chu de dag thams cad kyang autpala dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417a-1: dkar po dag gis khebs pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417a-2: me tog gi rigs che zhing bzang la dri bzang po'i ngang dang ldan pa gzhan dag gis kyang khebs te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417a-3: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i me tog gi rigs las de na med pa gang yang med do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417a-4: grong khyer de'i nang na skyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod de /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417a-5: thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa sha stag ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417a-6: skyed mos tshal de dag re re na'ang rdzing bu khor yug tu rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga brgya yod de /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417a-7: rdzing bu de dag thams cad nas rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi me tog autpala dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417a-9: padma dkar po rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa dag skyes te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417a-10: de dag gis chu de dag khebs shing /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417a-13: padma dkar po bzang po de dag thams cad kyang mchu zheng du shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417a-18: sngon por snang ba; ser po /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417a-28: dkar por ston pa; dkar por snang ba dag yod do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417a-29: rdzing bu de dag thams cad na ngang ngur dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417a-32: s'a ra sa sgra 'byin pa dag yod do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-0: skyed mos tshal de dag thams @417b cad kyang nga yir bya ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-1: 'di ltar yun ring por sems can de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-2: sangs rgyas kyi tshul la gus par byed pa rjes su 'gro ba'i thos pa dang sems pa legs par rtogs pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-3: yun ring por chos zab mo la mos pa'i sems can de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa yin no //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-5: grong khyer spos dang ldan pa de'i dbus kyi bzhi mdo na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khang pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-6: khor yug tu dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-7: rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-9: ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba zhig yod de /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-10: khang pa de na khang pa'i longs spyad pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-11: nye bar longs spyad pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-12: yongs su longs spyod pa dag tu rtag tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-13: mya ngan med ces bya ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-14: mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-15: me tog sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-16: skyed mos tshal de dag re re na'ang 'di lta ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-17: rdzing bu bzang po zhes bya ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-18: bzang mchog ces bya ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-19: dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-20: dga' mchog ces bya ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-21: bde ba zhes bya ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-22: bde mchog ces bya ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-23: nges pa zhes bya ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:417b-24: mi 'bab pa zhes bya ba brgyad brgyad yod de /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418a-10: ka ra ke ta na'i rang bzhin la gser gyi bye ma bdal ba ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418a-11: rdzing bu de dag re re la'ang them skas them pa rin po che'i rang bzhin sna tshogs pa rnam pa tha dad pas brgyan pa brgyad brgyad yod de /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418a-12: them skas de dag thams cad kyi bar nas kyang dzambu chu bo'i gser gyi shing ljon pa dag skyes so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418a-13: rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu ni /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418a-16: padma dkar po sna tshogs kyis khebs shing /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418a-20: s'a ra sa rnams skad 'byin to //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418a-21: rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug tu me tog gi shing rnam pa sna tshogs skyes te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418a-22: me tog gi shing de dag la rlung gis bskyod pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418a-23: me tog rnams rdzing bu'i nang du lhung bas rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu'ang tsandan gyi drir phyogs shing /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418a-28: de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'khor dang bcas pa bud med drug khri brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing dbang du gyur pa ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418a-29: rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418a-30: grong khyer de na sems can skyes pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418b-0: bud med gang @418b gzhan dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang skyed mos tshal lam /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418b-1: rdzing bu dag na rtag tu dga' zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan nas dbang du gyur te rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418b-2: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de dus de srid du 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod par byed cing /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418b-3: de na dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418b-4: sems can gang dag grong khyer spos ldan na 'khod pa de dag kyang grong khyer gyi dbus kyi bzhi mdor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khri gser gyi rkang pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418b-7: shel gyi rkang pa btsugs pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418b-9: stan bar tshangs can bting ba /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418b-10: steng snying po can du byas pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418b-11: ka shi ka'i gos bting ba /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418b-12: 'phang du rgyang grags phyed yod pa bshams te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418b-13: steng gi bar snang la'ang gos kyi bla re mu tig gis brgyan pa bres pa la ci 'di legs par gnas sam snyam pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418b-14: legs par gnas pa sna tshogs pa rnam par smin pas lhan cig tu mnyam par rab tu 'dzin par byed cing /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418b-15: sa phyogs de khor yug tu'ang me tog kha dog sna lnga pa dag mngon par gtor /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418b-16: rab tu gter; yang dag par gtor bar byed la /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:418b-17: ji ltar yang 'di chos kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos la gus pas sa @419a *//
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419a-1: phyogs de'ang dri dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu bdug par byed do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419a-2: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419a-5: de ltar chos la gus par byed cing chos rnams la brten pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419a-6: dad pa dang ldan pas dad pa dang dang ba bskyed pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan to //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419a-7: de na gang dag nyan pa'i lha dang mi srog chags brgya phrag mang po; ;srog chags stong phrag mang po dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419a-8: srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po tshogs pa de dag las la la ni /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419a-15: tshul bzhin yid la byed pas rtogs par byed de /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419a-16: sems can de dag thams cad kyang log par mi ltung ba'i chos can te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419a-17: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419a-19: khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du song zhig dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419a-20: de las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419a-23: yun ring po nas khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419b-0: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par @419b ston pa; yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419b-1: yang dag par gzengs bstod pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419b-2: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419b-4: des kyang sngon da ltar khyod ji ltar tshol ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal gyi /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419b-6: khyod nyin mtshan du yid la byed pa rgyun ma bcad par bskyed pas song zhing dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419b-7: ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419b-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus de thos nas dga' mgu yi rangs /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419b-10: rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419b-11: yid bde ba skyes par gyur pa 'di lta ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419b-13: skyes bu mde'u dug can zhig gis phog na yid la byed pa gzhan mi skyed kyi /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419b-14: gang bdag zug rngu 'di las sgrol zhing bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar par byed pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419b-15: zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman pa bdag gis nam rnyed snyam sems pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang de'i tshe gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de thos par byed cing /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:419b-16: chos gang thos nas bdag gi dmigs pa yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de bdag gis nam mthong snyam sems pa ma gtogs par chos gang yang yid la mi byed do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:420a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus phyogs de nyid du 'dug pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @420a *//
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:420a-1: chen po chos 'phags de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa thos so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:420a-2: thos nas kyang chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas de ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa 'di lta ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:420a-3: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:420a-4: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:420a-5: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa las nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:424b-12: phyogs gcig tu song nas ngus te mchi ma phyung nas 'di skad du /

K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:424b-14: lus nyo ba'ang bdag gis ma rnyed de /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:424b-16: thob pa ngan pa thob bo //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:424b-18: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di snyam du /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:424b-19: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di lta ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425a-0: chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag gi lus yongs su gtang bar lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin nam ma yin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag @425a *//
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425a-1: tu ngu bdag gis sad par bya'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425a-3: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ba der song ste 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425a-5: 'di ltar khyod yid mi dga' zhing gdung la mchi ma byung zhing gnas pa ci nyes /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425a-6: de la rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425a-9: lus 'di nyo ba yang ma rnyed do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425a-10: brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs can gyis smras pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425a-12: khyod ci'i phyir bdag nyid 'tshong bar 'dod /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425a-13: rtag tu ngus de la smras pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425a-16: chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs te chos la mchod par bya bar 'dod cing /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425a-17: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bya bar 'dod na /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425a-18: lus nyo ba de ngas ma rnyed nas de la nga 'di snyam du sems so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425a-19: kye ma nga ni; bsod nams chung bas 'di ltar lus btsongs te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425a-20: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur sti bya snyam na /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425a-21: bdag gi lus nyo ba'ang ma rnyed do snyam mo //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425a-22: de nas bram ze'i khye'u des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425b-0: nga la mis @425b ni; bya ba med kyi /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425b-1: 'on kyang nga mchod sbyin zhig byed de /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425b-5: rkang dag nga la dgos na /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425b-6: de rin gyis nyor byin cig ces byas pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425b-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425b-8: gang bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u 'di bdag gi snying dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425b-11: rkang nyo ba rnyed pa 'di ni /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425b-12: bdag gis rnyed pa'i mchog legs par rnyed do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425b-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425b-15: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425b-16: snyam nas de sems dga' ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425b-18: sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas bram ze'i khye'u de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425b-20: nga'i lus 'di las khyod gang dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425b-22: des de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425b-24: khyod rin du ci 'dod pa sbyin no //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425b-26: des de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425b-28: khyod kyis gang yongs su btang ba de nga la byin cig /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425b-29: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mtshon rnon po thogs nas lag pa g-yas pa phug ste khrag gzags so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425b-30: brla g-yas pa sha med par btogs nas rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ngo //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:425b-31: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig khang pa'i yang thog na 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu khrag mang po 'dzag pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426a-1: btogs nas rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426a-3: 'di ci'i phyir bdag nyid la bdag nyid 'di lta bu'i na tsha byed pa; bdag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du song ste dri'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426a-5: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426a-7: khyod ci'i phyir bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag byed /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426a-11: rtag tu ngus de la smras pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426a-13: bram ze'i khye'u 'di la lus btsongs te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426a-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426a-15: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur stir bya'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426a-16: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426a-18: khyod 'di ltar bdag gi snying dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426a-21: rkang yang btsongs te rigs kyi bu de la bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa khyod la yon tan gyi rigs sam /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426a-22: yon tan gyi khyad par ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426a-23: des bu mo de la 'di skad ces /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426a-26: gang la ngas bslab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426a-27: thabs mkhas pa dag ston par 'gyur te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426b-0: @426b bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426b-1: lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu'ang thob par 'gyur /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426b-2: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426b-3: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426b-10: mi 'jigs pa bzhi rab tu thob par 'gyur /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426b-11: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu thob par 'gyur /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426b-12: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang rab tu thob par 'gyur /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426b-13: mngon par shes pa lnga bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426b-14: tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426b-15: ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426b-16: shes rab rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rab tu thob par 'gyur /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426b-18: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur; gang gis sems can thams cad la kun tu bgo bsha' bya ba'i bla na med pa'i chos rin po che'ang rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426b-20: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:426b-22: khyod kyis 'di ltar chos rgya chen po phul du byung ba 'di dag yongs su brjod pa ni /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427a-1: 'di lta bu re re'i phyir yang bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du lus yongs su gtang bar bya ba yin na /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427a-2: mang po'i phyir lta ci smos te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427a-3: de tsam du khyod kyis chos 'di dag rgya che zhing phul du byung ba yongs su brjod pa ji lta bar bdag kyang 'dod cing bzod do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427a-4: de lta na'ang rigs kyi bu /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427a-5: khyod gang dang gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir bya ba'i gser ram /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427a-23: mar me khyod la ci dgos pa de dang de khyod la sbyin gyi /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427a-24: bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma byed cig /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427a-25: bdag kyang khyod dang 'grogs te 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong la /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427a-26: bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427a-27: de lta bu'i chos de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427a-29: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad mi snang bar byas nas bdag nyid kyi lus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427a-31: khyod de lta bu'i yi dam la brtan pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427b-0: de lta bu'i chos @427b don du gnyer ba 'di ni /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427b-3: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa yongs su zhus pas chos rin po che shin tu thob nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427b-4: rigs kyi bu; nga la snying dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427b-7: rkang gis bya ba med kyi /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427b-8: nga khyod sad pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyi /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427b-12: khyod la mchog ci lta bu zhig sbyin par bya zhes smras so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427b-15: sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dag bdag la stsol cig /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427b-19: nga'i nus pa yod pa ma yin te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427b-20: yul 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul du gyur pa yin gyi /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427b-23: bdag gi lus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i gnas 'di la ni /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427b-24: lha'i dbang po brgya byin khyod brtson pa chung bar gyis shig /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427b-25: lha rnams kyi dbang po nga'i lus 'di la bdag nyid kyis bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs bya'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:427b-26: lha rnams kyi dbang po bden pa gang gis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan cing /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428a-1: lhag pa'i bsam pa g-yo med par mkhyen na /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428a-3: bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi lus sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur cig ces byas pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428a-4: de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428a-5: lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i lus sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428a-7: gnod pa med par gyur to //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428a-8: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428a-9: bdud sdig can yang spobs pa med par gyur te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la lan glan par spobs pa ma skyes nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428a-11: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so; ;rigs kyi bu /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428a-13: bdag gi khyim gang na yod pa der 'dong ngo //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428a-14: bdag gis pha ma'i drung nas nor blangs te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428a-15: 'di ltar chos 'dod pa'i phyir gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mchod par bya ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428a-16: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la yang bkur stir bya ba khyod la sbyin no //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428a-17: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang 'grogs nas de'i rang gi khyim gang na yod pa der dong ste phyin nas sgo drung du bsdad do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428b-0: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de rang gi khyim du phyin nas @428b pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428b-18: rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs dag bdag la stsol cig /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428b-19: bdag kyang khyed kyis stsal pa'i g-yog mo bu mo lnga brgya 'di dag dang lhan cig dgyer gsol /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428b-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang bdag cag 'grogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428b-21: de'ang bdag cag la chos ston par 'gyur zhing des bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428b-22: de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so; ;bu mo /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428b-23: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu zhes bya ba de su zhig /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428b-26: rigs kyi bu de da lta 'o skol gyi sgo drung na mchis te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428b-28: lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang dag par zhugs pa 'di lta ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:428b-29: sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu ma mchis pa las thar bar bgyi bar 'tshal bas de chos 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag nyid btsongs la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bgyi bar 'tshal /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429a-0: @429a *// 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bgyi bar 'tshal na /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429a-1: de'i lus nyo ba 'ga' yang ma rnyed cing ma rnyed pas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas mi dga' bar sems shing mchi ma phyung nas mchis pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429a-2: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur bas smras pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429a-5: yid mi bde bas mi dga' bar sems shing mchi ma phyung nas gnas pa ci nyes /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429a-8: bdag gi de nyo ba'ang ma rnyed do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429a-9: bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs kyi brgya byin gyis smras pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429a-11: khyod gang gi phyir lus 'tshong bar 'dod ces bgyis pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429a-13: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429a-14: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la yang bkur stir bya'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429a-15: nga'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429a-16: de la rag las pas 'di lta ste; chos 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429a-18: bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs kyi brgya byin gyis smras pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429a-22: 'on kyang nga mchod sbyin zhig byed pa der mi'i snying dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429a-27: rigs kyi bu des yi ma sad par de la 'di skad du sbyin no //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429b-0: zhes smras nas de mtshon rnon po thogs @429b te bdag gi lag pa phug nas khrag gzugs /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429b-1: brla sha med par btogs te rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429b-4: snyam nas rigs kyi bu de khrag gzags pa bdag khang pa'i yang thog na mchis pas mthong ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429b-5: de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429b-6: mi 'di ci'i slad du 'di lta bur bdag nyid la bdag nyid na tsha dag bgyid snyam ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429b-7: de'i thad du bdag mchis nas 'di skad du bgyis so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429b-9: 'di ltar bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid kyi lus kyi khrag gzags pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429b-10: de bdag la 'di skad ces mchi ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429b-12: bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429b-19: nga la nor gzhan ci'ang med do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429b-21: bdag gis khyod la nor gyis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429b-24: chos 'dod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429b-25: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur stir bya'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429b-26: zhes mchi nas bdag gis de la 'di skad ces bgyis te rigs kyi bu /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429b-27: des khyod la yon tan gyi rigs sam /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429b-28: yon tan gyi khyad par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429b-30: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:429b-31: sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhal du med pa rnams rab tu ston par 'gyur ro //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430a-1: lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams de las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430a-3: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos nas bdag kyang dga' ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430a-5: mgu ba chen po skyes nas 'di snyam du bgyid de /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430a-6: rigs kyi bu 'di shin tu chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'di lta bur gang rang gi lus kyi bar du'ang mi gnas par spro ba ni /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430a-10: chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong na /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430a-11: bdag cag la longs spyod gang dag mang zhing rgya che ba dag yod na /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430a-12: ci'i phyir bdag cag chos la mchod pa mi bgyid /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430a-13: 'di lta bu'i gnas dag la smon lam ci'i phyir mi gdab snyam nas rigs kyi bu /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430a-14: de la bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyis so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430a-16: khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i srog 'phrog pa'i tshul gyi na tsha dag ma byed cig /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430a-17: khyod don gang gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir bya ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430a-18: bla mar bya ba'i nor mang po dag bdag gis pha ma las blangs te bdag kyang khyod dang 'grogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der mchi'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430a-19: bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de la mchod par bgyi'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430a-20: gang khyod kyis yongs su brjod pa 'di lta ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430a-21: sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa de lta bu'i chos dag bdag gis kyang rdzogs par bgyi'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430b-0: yab yum gyis dkor @430b gyi phung po chen po de bdag la stsal pa gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430b-1: bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de dang lhan cig tu 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod par bgyi'o ////
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430b-2: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430b-3: bam po nyi shu bzhi pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430b-4: de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430b-5: rigs kyi bu de'i dka' ba'i gnas dag khyod kyis bstan pa las na /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430b-7: gcig tu nges par bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430b-8: 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430b-9: sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa'i bar ni /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430b-11: rigs kyi bu gang dag de dag gi phyir de lta bu'i dka' ba'i gnas dag la spro bar byed na /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430b-14: nged kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags blta ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430b-18: nged 'gro ba'i go skabs phye zhig /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430b-19: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod par bya ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430b-20: bkur stir bya ba'i phyir chas te rang gi pha ma la rig par byas nas 'di skad ces /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430b-21: yab yum ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin du mdzod cig dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430b-23: dge ba'i phyogs gang gi'ang bar chad mi bgyid do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430b-24: zhes smras nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:430b-25: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431a-0: @431a *// bkur stir bya ba'i phyir chas par gyur to //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431a-1: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des shing rta lnga brgya'ang rgyan gyis brgyan /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431a-2: bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang rgyan gyis brgyan to //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431a-3: rgyan gyis brgyan nas me tog tha dad pa kha dog sna tshogs pa dag dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431a-4: gos kha dog sna tshogs thogs /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431a-15: rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431a-16: rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i rang bzhin gyi me tog dag kyang thogs /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431a-19: myang ba mang po pha mas kyang thogs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang shing rta gcig tu lhan cig tu zhugs te bu mo lnga brgya shing rta lnga brgya'i nang du zhugs pa de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas pha ma la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su dong ste mthar gyis song ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431a-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus rgyang ring mo zhig nas grong khyer spos ldan rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra ba blta na sdug pa las byas pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431a-21: rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431a-24: shing ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431b-0: mchur dpag tshad bcu @431b gnyis; zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431b-4: mi dang skye bo mang pos gang pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431b-5: bar gyi tshong khang gi phreng ba ri mo sna tshogs su bris pa lta bu blta na sdug pa; phigs par gyur pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431b-7: skye bo dang khyogs kyi bzhon pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431b-8: rkang gis 'gro ba'i gnas 'dzer dog med par gnas pa lnga brgya dag gis legs par bsgrubs pa grong khyer de'i dbus kyi bzhi mdo na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos kyi khri la 'dug nas 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431b-10: 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas chos ston pa mthong ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431b-11: mthong ma thag tu de 'di lta bu'i bde ba thob pa 'di lta ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431b-13: dge slong bsam gtan dang po rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin no //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431b-14: de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431b-15: bdag shing rta'i nang du zhugs bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du 'gro ba ni /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431b-16: bdag gis mi cha'o; ;snyam nas shing rta las babs so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431b-17: de nas shing rta de las babs pa dang gzhan tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:431b-18: bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang mnyam du shing rta las babs so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te mchod pa'i bkod pa tshad med pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @432a *//
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432a-1: chos 'phags ga la ba der dong ngo //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432a-2: yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin las byas pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432a-3: tsandan dmar pos brgyan cing mu tig gi dra bas g-yogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432a-4: khang pa brtsegs pa de'i gru bzhir nor bu rin po che bzhag par gyur te de dag sgron ma'i bya ba byed do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432a-5: bdug spos kyi snod dngul las byas pa bzhi'ang phyogs bzhir btags te 'di lta ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432a-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir aa ka ru nag po 'ba' zhig gis bdug par byed do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432a-7: khang pa brtsegs pa de'i dbus su rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khri bzhi btsugs te de'i steng du rin po che'i sgrom bzhi bzhag nas de'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi glegs bam la bee d'urya bzhu bas bris pa bcug ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432a-8: khang pa brtsegs pa de'ang dar gyi chun po sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa 'phyang bas brgyan to //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432a-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas khang pa brtsegs pa de mchod pa'i bkod pa tshad med pas brgyan pa mthong zhing /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432a-10: de na lha stong phrag du ma dag kyang mthong ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432a-11: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog mand'a ra ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432a-12: lha'i tsandan gyi phye ma dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432a-13: lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432a-14: lha'i dngul gyi phye ma dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa de la 'thor /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432b-0: mngon par 'thor @432b mngon par rab tu 'thor bar mthong ngo //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432b-1: lha'i sil snyan dag kyang thos so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432b-2: mthong zhing thos nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432b-4: khyod lha stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'di la ci'i phyir lha'i me tog mand'a ra ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432b-5: lha'i tsandan gyi phye ma dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432b-6: lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432b-7: lha'i dngul gyi phye ma dag gis 'thor zhing mngon par mthor /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432b-9: lha'i sil snyan 'di dag kyang lha rnams par snang la ci'i phyir rdung /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432b-10: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432b-11: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432b-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432b-16: 'di la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su 'gro ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432b-17: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432b-18: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ba yin na /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432b-20: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432b-21: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:432b-23: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:433a-0: yongs su 'dren pa de gang na @433a *//
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:433a-5: khang pa brtsegs pa 'di'i nang na gser gyi glegs bam la bee d'urya bzhu bas bris pa 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rgya rim pa bdun gyis rgyas btab nas bzhag ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:433a-6: nged kyis khyod la bstan par dka'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:433a-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te bu mo lnga brgya dag dang lhan cig tu de dag gis me tog dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:433a-21: dngul las byas pa'i me tog gang dag thogs te 'ongs pa'i tshogs de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas te 'di lta ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:433a-22: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa'i phyir de dag las gzhan dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:433a-23: gzhan ches so sor bzhag go /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:433a-24: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:433a-25: tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dag gis me tog dang bdug pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:433b-0: dngul las byas pa'i me tog @433b dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:433b-1: lha'i rol mo rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngar mchod pa byas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der song ste phyin nas chos la mchod pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la me tog dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:433b-14: dngul las byas pa'i me tog dag gis gtor /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:433b-16: mngon par rab tu gtor to //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:433b-17: lha'i sil snyan dag kyang yang dag par rab tu dkrol lo //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:433b-18: de nas me tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi spyi bo'i steng na me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa zhig tu gyur to //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:433b-19: gser dang dngul las byas pa'i me tog dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:433b-20: kha dog sna tshogs pa'i me tog de dag nam mkha' la gzhal med khang 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:433b-22: gos rin po che de dag kyang bar snang la rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:433b-23: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:433b-24: tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:433b-25: mthong nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te ngo mtshar to //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434a-0: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @434a *//
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434a-1: chen po chos 'phags 'di rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che la /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434a-4: 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa nyid na'ang rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra yang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434a-5: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam mo //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434a-6: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba bskyed nas tshogs pa de dag thams cad dang lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434a-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis chos gang thob par gyur pa 'di lta bu'i chos rnams thob par gyur cig /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434a-10: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur stir byed pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434a-11: bla mar byed pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur stir byed pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434a-12: bla mar byed par shog cig /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ji ltar yang dag par ston pa bzhin du bdag cag kyang skye bo mang po la yang dag par ston par gyur cig /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434b-0: @434b ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434b-1: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs pa de bzhin du bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434b-2: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par shog cig ces smras so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434b-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434b-4: tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur sti byas te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rkang pa la mgo bo rnams kyis mngon du phyag 'tshal nas zhe sa byed cing thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434b-7: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434b-9: 'di na bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshol zhing 'brog dgon par phyin pa na /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434b-10: rigs kyi bu; shar phyogs su song zhig dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434b-11: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434b-13: bdag gis sgra de las yang dag par bstan pa de thos nas shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su mchis nas 'di snyam du bsams te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:434b-14: bdag gis sgra de la ji srid gcig tu mchi bar bgyi /

K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440a-5: mngon par rab tu 'thor zhing tshig 'di skad ces /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440a-10: khyod kyi mthus deng bdag cag gis kyang sems can gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i sa la gnas pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440a-11: lta ba dang bcas pa thams cad la mngon par zhen pa'i 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440a-12: don dam pa las byung ba'i gtam bstan pa thos so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440a-14: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440a-16: sa chen po g-yos pa 'jig rten du byung ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags; rkyen gang lags /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440a-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis smras pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mi byon /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440a-20: mi bzhud pa bstan pa 'di khyod kyis dris te bdag gis bstan pas srog chags stong phrag brgyad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440a-21: srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440a-22: srog chags drug khri bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma med pa rnam par dag par gyur to //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440b-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @440b po rtag tu ngu dga' ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440b-1: rangs pa mchog tu rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440b-2: gang bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440b-4: bzhud pa med pa'i bstan pa 'di dris pas /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440b-5: sems can 'di snyed cig gi don byas par gyur pa ni /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440b-6: bdag gis rnyed pa mchog tu legs par rnyed do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440b-7: 'di nyid kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su 'grub par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog thob par gyur pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bdag slar yang the tshom mi 'jug go /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440b-9: the tshom med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440b-12: rangs pa de dang ldan pas ta la bdun tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags nas ta la bdun tsam na 'dug ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440b-13: 'di ltar bdag nam mkha' la 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440b-15: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mngon par 'phags pa mthong ste de'i sems sems kyis shes nas de la lha'i me tog mand'a ra ba dag byin te 'di skad du /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:440b-16: rigs kyi bu; khyod kyis lha'i me tog 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti byed pas bkur stir gyis shig /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441a-0: ngas khyod yongs su bzung ba @441a *//
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441a-2: khyod kyi mthus deng srog chags stong phrag mang po'i don byas te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441a-4: gang sems can thams cad kyi phyir ji ltar khyod spro bar byed pa de ltar bskal pa gzhal du med grangs med par spro bar byed cing /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441a-5: khur chen po khyer bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441a-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi drung nas me tog mand'a ra ba de dag blangs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441a-9: mngon par gtor; mngon par rab tu gtor nas bdag gi lus kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mngon par bkab ste tshig 'di skad ces /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441a-11: deng slan chad khyod kyi rim gro dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441a-12: zham 'bring bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gi lus khyod la 'bul lo //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441a-14: des bdag gi lus phul nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441a-15: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441a-16: bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441a-18: bdag cag kyang khyod la lus 'bul gyi /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441a-19: bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos de dag thob par gyur cig /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441a-20: khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu yang dang yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441b-0: byang @441b chub sems dpa' rnams bkur stir bgyi /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441b-2: de dag dang nye bar gyur par bgyi'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441b-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya la 'di skad ces smras so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441b-6: gal te khyed nga la lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas par byed na /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441b-7: nga la lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid byin cig dang de ltar na bu mo khyed ngas blang ngo //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441b-8: bu mo de dag gis smras pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441b-9: khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas khyod kyi rjes su mthun par 'jug go /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441b-10: khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pas ci dang ci 'dod par bya bar bdag nyid 'bul lo //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441b-11: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441b-12: shing rta lnga brgya'ang brgyan nas thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la rim gro dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441b-13: zham 'bring bya ba'i phyir phul te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441b-16: g-yog mo 'di dag 'bul zhing shing rta lnga brgya 'di dag kyang yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir khyod la 'bul lo //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441b-17: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis rigs kyi bu de la legs so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:441b-23: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'byor pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442a-0: yongs su gtong ba'i sems de lta bus byang chub sems dpa' sems @442a *//
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442a-1: dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442a-3: chos smra ba dag la mchod pa byas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442a-4: thabs mkhas pa nyan nus te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442a-6: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'di lta bu'i tshul dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442a-7: 'di lta bu'i gtong ba la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442a-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442a-9: thabs mkhas pa yongs su dris so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442a-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442a-11: shing rta lnga brgya po de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir blangs te blangs nas rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngu la slar byin no //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442a-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags stan las langs te bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang nyi ma nub par gyur to //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442a-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems par gyur te; 'di ltar bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442a-14: 'dug pa'am nyal bar byed pa ni /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos @442b 'phags bdag gzung ba'i phyir 'di lta ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442b-1: chos ston du phyir ma byung gi bar du bdag 'greng ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442b-2: 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar bya'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442b-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun gyi bar du ting nge 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs par gyur cing /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stong phrag gzhal du med grangs med pa dag dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442b-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442b-7: thabs mkhas pa las byung ba la gnas par gyur to //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'ang lo bdun gyi bar du gnyid dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442b-9: rmugs pa med par spyod lam rnam pa gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar byed de /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442b-10: lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442b-11: gnod sems kyi rtog pa ma byung /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442b-12: rnam par 'tshe ba'i rtog pa ma byung /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442b-13: ro la brkam pa ma yin /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442b-14: sems kyi rnam par rtog pa ma byung ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442b-15: gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ting nge 'dzin las nam ldang bar 'gyur /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442b-16: bdag cag gis kyang khri gang la rigs kyi bu de 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi khri bshams nas bdag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag ma btab kyi /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442b-17: sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:442b-18: thabs mkhas pa rab tu ston pa 'gyur ba der legs par byug par bya /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:443a-0: @443a *// me tog sna tshogs mngon par dgram mo /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:443a-2: tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob cing spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar byed de /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:443a-3: bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rjes su 'jug go /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:443a-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i sgra dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags da ste zhag bdun na ting nge 'dzin 'di las ldang ste langs nas grong khyer gyi dbus su 'dug ste chos ston par 'gyur ro //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:443a-5: zhes thos so; ;de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i sgra de thos pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:443a-7: rab tu dga' mgu zhing bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes te tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu sa phyogs de phyags [*phyogs?] nas chos kyi khri rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin bshams so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:443a-8: de nas bu mo de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos lus las phud de bla gos lnga brgya po de dag stan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba der bting ngo //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:443a-9: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi stan bshams pa la bu mo de dag thams cad dga' mgu yid rangs /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:443a-10: rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur to //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:443b-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' @443b sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus phyogs der chag chag gdab par 'dod na /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:443b-1: ci nas kyang bdud sdig can gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de chu ma rnyed nas sems mi dga' zhing sdug bsngal te yid mi bde bar gyur cing sems gzhan du 'gyur ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:443b-2: gang gis de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:443b-3: mchod pa de'ang mi mdzes par bya ba'i phyir gang gis sa phyogs der chag chag 'debs pa'i chu de thams cad kyang mi snang ba nyid du byas pas kun tu chu btsal na chu ma rnyed do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:443b-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:443b-5: ma la bdag gi lus phug la khrag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab bo //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:443b-9: sa phyogs 'di nas rdul gyi khams byung bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog na mi rung gi /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:443b-10: bdag gi lus gdon mi za bar 'jig pa'i chos can 'dis ci zhig bya /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:443b-11: bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig pa ni /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:443b-13: nus ba med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i rgyu dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:443b-14: 'dod pa'i gzhis yang dang yang du 'khor bar 'khor zhing bdag gi lus stong phrag mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:443b-16: chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir ni /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:443b-18: 'dod pa de lta bu'i chos can la zhig pa yin no //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus de ltar bsams @444a *//
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444a-1: nas mtshon rnon po blangs te bdag gi lus kun tu phug nas rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de thams cad du chag chag btab bo //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob pa tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis kyang mtshon rnon po blangs te rang rang gi lus phug nas rang rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de thams cad du chag chag btab ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444a-3: gang de dag la bdud sdig can des dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad bya ba'i glags gang du rnyed par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444a-4: bu mo de dag thams cad sems gzhan du gyur pa med do //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444a-5: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di tsam du chos 'dod pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444a-7: ji tsam du yi dam la brtan pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444a-8: ji tsam du go cha chen po bgos pa dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444a-11: longs spyod rnams la mi lta ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444a-12: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'di lta ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444a-13: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yongs su dpag tu med pa las sems can thams cad thar bar bya'o //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444a-14: snyam du lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa ni /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444b-0: de @444b nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de dag thams cad lha'i tsandan gyi chur byin gyis brlabs te lha'i tsandan gyi chu dri dam pa /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444b-2: bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa de'i dris sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad lnga brgya tshang bar dris yongs su khyab bo //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444b-3: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444b-8: khyod kyis brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab pa legs so /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444b-11: chos yongs su tshol ba'ang legs te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444b-13: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'di lta bu dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444b-15: chos 'dod pa 'di lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444b-17: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444b-18: bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi stan ni /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444b-22: chag chag ni; legs par btab na /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:444b-23: bdag gis me tog gang dag gis sa phyogs 'dir legs par gtor bar bya ba dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:445a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos @445a *//
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:445a-1: 'chad cing chos kyi stan la 'dug pa la gtor bar bya ba'i me tog de dag gang nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam mo //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:445a-2: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:445a-4: lha'i me tog mand'a ra ba 'di dag longs la khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog bkram par gyis shig /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:445a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos ston cing chos kyi khri la 'dug pa la yang gtor cig ces smras nas des de la lha'i me tog mand'a ra ba lha'i khal stong byin no; ;de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus me tog de dag blangs te me tog kha cig gis ni /

K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:447b-7: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas te tshul 'di lta bu nyid dang /

K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:448a-3: dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni /

K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:448a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis glegs bam chen po la yi ge gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba legs par bris te me tog dang /

K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:448b-10: bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa lags so //
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:448b-11: bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa lags so //

K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:448b-18: yid kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong bas rim gror byas te /

K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:449b-5: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /

K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:449b-8: yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:449b-10: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa rdzogs so ////
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:449b-11: rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'akya se na dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:449b-13: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe dharma t'a sh'i la la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phabs /

K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:449b-15: sgra bsgyur gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos 'grel pa dang mthun par bsgyur /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:449b-16: slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta chen po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang /

K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:449b-18: yang slad kyis skyid smad mnye thang na mo cher pandi ta chen po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:449b-19: lo ts'a ba 'brom rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas gnyis kyis brgyad stong pa bshad pa'i dus su che long zhig gtan la phabs /
K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:450a-0: phyis rva sgreng gi gtsug lag khang du lo ts'a ba 'brom rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyis rgya gar gyi @450a *//

K04acip-k_lha_sa-029-001:450a-5: slar yang snyigs dus kyi thams cad mkhyen pa chen po zhva lu lo ts'a ba dpal rin chen chos skyong bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis rgya bod kyi dpe du ma dang bstun nas shin tu rnam par dag par mdzad pa'i ma phyi las slar yang zhus te gtan la phabs pa'o ////
